component.name: DeepQt
component.summary: Harness the power of the DeepL API with this friendly user interface

description.p: DeepQt is a user-friendly application that harnesses the power of the DeepL API for translation purposes. With a clean interface and support for batch processing of plain text files and EPUB books, DeepQt makes it easy to translate texts efficiently and effectively.
DeepQt also features higher-level glossaries allowing you to make replacements before translation, to ensure consistnecy in terms. These can even be applied without translating anything!
To use DeepQt's translation features, you will need a DeepL API license, either free or pro.
